schema.example: 中华人民共和国人民解放军

schema.description: **文本实体抽取**模型预测是否返回详细结果，取值true或者false。
**关键短语抽取**模型，设置返回top结果数量。

Content.description: 预测结果，格式为JSON字符串。
Content.example: ["人民解放军","中华人民共和国"]

400.errorMessage: The NLP Auto Machine Learning service has not been activated.
The maximum number of free API daily visits is exceeded.
The length of content exceeds the limit.

403.errorMessage: An error occurred while authenticating the model.
You are not authorized to operate on the specified resource.

404.errorMessage: The specified Model does not exist.

500.errorMessage: An error occurred while processing your request.
The model inference result is null.

503.errorMessage: An error occurred while processing your request.
